001package io.jstach.rainbowgum.spi;
002
003import java.util.ArrayList;
004import java.util.Comparator;
005import java.util.List;
006import java.util.Optional;
007import java.util.ServiceLoader;
008import java.util.stream.Stream;
009
010import org.eclipse.jdt.annotation.Nullable;
011
012import io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogConfig;
013import io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogProperties;
014import io.jstach.rainbowgum.RainbowGum;
015import io.jstach.rainbowgum.ServiceRegistry;
016
017/**
018 * RainbowGum SPI. The Rainbow Gum SPI uses the {@link ServiceLoader} with the
019 * registration of <strong>this class</strong> and <em>NOT the <code>non-sealed</code>
020 * subclasses!</em> Read the {@link ServiceLoader} doc to understand how to register a
021 * service loader class. A common option is to use an annotation processor to generate the
022 * <code>META-INF/services</code> registration. There are several libraries that can do
023 * this:
024 * <ul>
025 * <li><a href="https://github.com/jstachio/pistachio#serviceloader-helper">Pistachio
026 * SVC</a></li>
027 * <li><a href="https://avaje.io/spi/">Avaje SPI</a></li>
028 * <li><a href="https://github.com/kohsuke/metainf-services">metainf-services</a></li>
029 * </ul>
030 * However if your application is fully modularized (has a <code>module-info.java</code>)
031 * you will need to use the module-info syntax:
032 * {@snippet :
033 *
034 * provides io.jstach.rainbowgum.spi.RainbowGumServiceProvider with com.mycompany.SomeService;
035 *
036 * }
037 * <strong>Initialization Order:</strong>
038 * <ol>
039 * <li>{@link PropertiesProvider}</li>
040 * <li>{@link Configurator}</li>
041 * <li>{@link RainbowGumProvider}</li>
042 * </ol>
043 *
044 */
045@SuppressWarnings("InvalidInlineTag")
046public sealed interface RainbowGumServiceProvider {
047
048        /**
049         * Provides properties and or register services.
050         */
051        public non-sealed interface PropertiesProvider extends RainbowGumServiceProvider {
052
053                /**
054                 * Provides properties and or register services. <em>If just registering services
055                 * and not providing properies an empty list can be returned. </em>
056                 * @param registry registry is usually empty here.
057                 * @return list of properties.
058                 */
059                List<LogProperties> provideProperties(ServiceRegistry registry);
060
061        }
062
063        /**
064         * Providers sometimes need multiple passes to support dependencies without using true
065         * dependency injection.
066         */
067        public enum Pass {
068
069                /**
070                 * First pass.
071                 */
072                FIRST,
073                /**
074                 * Second or greater pass but not the last pass.
075                 */
076                MIDDLE,
077                /**
078                 * The last pass to return true otherwise Rainbow Gum will fail to load. This
079                 * state is useful if a provider can provide a better error by throwing an
080                 * exception.
081                 */
082                LAST;
083
084                static Pass of(int pass, int total) {
085                        if (pass >= (total - 1)) {
086                                return LAST;
087                        }
088                        if (pass == 0) {
089                                return FIRST;
090                        }
091                        return MIDDLE;
092                }
093
094        }
095
096        /**
097         * The default amount of passes made to resolve registrators or configurators.
098         */
099        public static int PASSES = 4;
100
101        /**
102         * Called after {@link LogConfig} has been loaded to do various custom initialization
103         * like registering {@link io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogOutput.OutputProvider}s.
104         * <p>
105         * The configurator has the option to return <code>false</code> to indicate a retry
106         * needs to be made. This is a simple way to handle dependency needs of one
107         * configurator needing another to run prior.
108         *
109         * @see LogConfig#outputRegistry()
110         * @see ServiceRegistry
111         */
112        @FunctionalInterface
113        public non-sealed interface Configurator extends RainbowGumServiceProvider {
114
115                /**
116                 * Do ad-hoc initialization before RainbowGum is fully loaded.
117                 * @param config config.
118                 * @param pass info on what pass this is.
119                 * @return <code>true</code> if all dependencies were found.
120                 */
121                boolean configure(LogConfig config, Pass pass);
122
123                /**
124                 * The default amount of passes made to resolve configurators.
125                 */
126                public static int CONFIGURATOR_PASSES = PASSES;
127
128                /**
129                 * Runs configurators. If a configurator returns false then it will be retried.
130                 * The default of {@value #CONFIGURATOR_PASSES} passes will be tried.
131                 * @param configurators stream of configurators.
132                 * @param config config to use for registration.
133                 * @throws IllegalStateException if there are configurators still returning
134                 * <code>false</code>.
135                 */
136                public static void runConfigurators(Stream<? extends RainbowGumServiceProvider.Configurator> configurators,
137                                LogConfig config) {
138                        runConfigurators(configurators, config, CONFIGURATOR_PASSES);
139                }
140
141                /**
142                 * Runs configurators. If a configurator returns false then it will be retried.
143                 * @param configurators stream of configurators.
144                 * @param config config to use for registration.
145                 * @param passes number of times to retry configurator if it returns
146                 * @throws IllegalStateException if there are configurators still returning
147                 * <code>false</code>.
148                 */
149                private static void runConfigurators(Stream<? extends RainbowGumServiceProvider.Configurator> configurators,
150                                LogConfig config, int passes) {
151                        List<Configurator> unresolved = new ArrayList<>(configurators.toList());
152                        for (int i = 0; i < passes; i++) {
153                                var it = unresolved.iterator();
154                                while (it.hasNext()) {
155                                        var c = it.next();
156                                        if (c.configure(config, Pass.of(i, passes))) {
157                                                it.remove();
158                                                if (c instanceof AutoCloseable ac) {
159                                                        config.serviceRegistry().onClose(ac);
160                                                }
161                                        }
162                                }
163                                if (unresolved.isEmpty()) {
164                                        break;
165                                }
166                        }
167                        if (!unresolved.isEmpty()) {
168                                throw new IllegalStateException("Configurators could not find dependencies (returned false) after "
169                                                + passes + " passes. configurators = " + unresolved);
170                        }
171
172                }
173
174        }
175
176        /**
177         * Implement to create a custom RainbowGum. This is the preferred way to customize
178         * RainbowGum publishers, appenders, and outputs.
179         */
180        public non-sealed interface RainbowGumProvider extends RainbowGumServiceProvider {
181
182                /**
183                 * Optionally provides a rainbow gum based on config.
184                 * @param config config loaded.
185                 * @return a Rainbow Gum or not.
186                 */
187                Optional<RainbowGum> provide(LogConfig config);
188
189                /**
190                 * If there are multiple rainbow gum providers found the higher priority ones are
191                 * tried first ({@link #provide(LogConfig)}). The default is {@code 0}.
192                 * <p>
193                 * This feature allows custom rainbow gums for different environments like a
194                 * testing version that lives in its own jar that is in Maven scope test. If its
195                 * priority is higher and {@link #provide(LogConfig)} returns a non-empty optional
196                 * then it will be used instead of than the production Rainbow Gum.
197                 * @return priority order where higher number means it will be tried earlier.
198                 */
199                default int priority() {
200                        return 0;
201                }
202
203        }
204
205        /**
206         * Finds service providers based on type.
207         * @param <T> provider interface type.
208         * @param loader service loader to use.
209         * @param providerType provider class.
210         * @return stream containing only provider of the given type.
211         */
212        public static <T extends RainbowGumServiceProvider> Stream<T> findProviders(
213                        ServiceLoader<RainbowGumServiceProvider> loader, Class<T> providerType) {
214                return loader.stream().flatMap(p -> {
215                        if (providerType.isAssignableFrom(p.type())) {
216                                var s = providerType.cast(p.get());
217                                return Stream.of(s);
218                        }
219                        return Stream.empty();
220                });
221        }
222
223        /**
224         * Creates config from service loader.
225         * @param loader service loader.
226         * @return config.
227         */
228        public static LogConfig provideConfig(ServiceLoader<RainbowGumServiceProvider> loader) {
229                return LogConfig.builder().serviceLoader(loader).build();
230        }
231
232        /**
233         * Will load all RainbowGum SPI to create a RainbowGum powered from the ServiceLoader.
234         * @return Rainbow Gum.
235         */
236        public static RainbowGum provide() {
237                ServiceLoader<RainbowGumServiceProvider> loader = ServiceLoader.load(RainbowGumServiceProvider.class);
238                var config = provideConfig(loader);
239                @Nullable
240                RainbowGum gum = findProviders(loader, RainbowGumProvider.class)
241                        .sorted(Comparator.comparingInt(RainbowGumProvider::priority).reversed())
242                        .flatMap(s -> s.provide(config).stream())
243                        .findFirst()
244                        .orElse(null);
245
246                if (gum == null) {
247                        gum = RainbowGum.builder(config).build();
248                }
249                return gum;
250        }
251
252}
